title: Fitur: International Tourism Trade Fair
description: 8,000+ exhibitors & over 100,000 travel industry professionals and enthusiasts will come together in Madrid for Fitur 2023. From January 18-22, our colleagues Jhon Ruiz and Juan Sanchez will be on-site, spreading the word about #Camino, the blockchain ecosystem for the travel industry. Listen to our presentation on Friday at the Hiberus booth about a brand-new use case. Join us at this global meeting point to discuss the future of travel powered by blockchain.

title: Travolution European Summit
description: We are very excited to announce that Chain4Travel's CEO, Ralf Usbeck, will give a keynote speech at the Travolution European Summit 2023. Leading the adoption of blockchain technology in the travel industry with Camino, his speech will blend perfectly with the overall future-focused environment set by the event theme #metatravel. Let's discuss how travel companies must prepare for the technological revolution and what role Camino will play.

title: ITB Berlin
description: ITB Berlin has been an integral authority in the global travel industry for more than 50 years. Countries, cities, regions, tour operators, booking portals, hotels, and many other service providers from numerous countries will be on site. We from Chain4Travel will also be present at our own exhibition stand. We look forward to the unique chance to meet these many travel players and present our innovative technology solution to this community.

title: WTM London
description: Since 1980, World Travel Market has been an established international institution on the travel trade show landscape, attended by travel professionals from around the world. It was an honor to join the panel on the travel technology stage and discuss the topic of blockchain with other industry experts.

title: Phocuswright Conference
description: Phocuswright Conference is a valuable platform for innovative companies empowered to tackle our industry's challenges. We had interesting conversations about web3, blockchain technology for the travel industry, and how Camino will revolutionize the world of travel. See for yourselves.

title: Token 2049 London
description: Token2049 in London was impressive. Over 3,000 attendees ​from the global crypto industry met entrepreneurs, investors, developers, industry insiders, and global media - and we were there, too, as the only layer one for the travel industry. We look forward to next year's event.

title: Fvw Travel Talk
description: A key question of the Fvw I TravelTalk convention was how new technologies, such as blockchain, are emerging and shaping new ways of working in the industry. We were happy to join these discussions and share some insights about blockchain in travel and real-life use cases on the Camino network in our keynote speeches and panel discussion.

title: Token2049
description: Token2049, Asia's largest Web3 conference, comes to an end: 7000+ attendees, 2000+ global companies, and Chain4Travel as the only Layer1 provider for a global travel ecosystem. Click below to read Pablos' impressions and key learnings of Token 2049 in Singapore.

title: Consensus (by CoinDesk)
description: Consensus is much more than just another crypto festival. CoinDesk brought together roughly 17,000 crypto enthusiasts and experts discussing the regulatory landscape, web3 and the future of digital assets. Vincent Usbeck, Head of Marketing and Sales, was in Austin and looks back on interesting keynotes, inspiring discussions, and an overall extremely future-oriented environment.

title: Phocuswright Europe
description: Under the motto “Fast Forward”, we visited this year’s Phocuswright Event in Amsterdam. True to this motto, we have seen inspiring keynotes, innovative use cases and were able to make new connections within the travel industry. Camino is something that will bring the industry fast forward. We are certain about it. Follow our journey and become part of the travel industry.

title: VIR Online Innovation Days
description: The VIR invited for this years’ Online Innovation Days under the motto “Back to the Future” (“Zurück zur Zukunft”). Even two members of the Chain4Travel team held a keynote speech on the topic of Blockchain and Chain4travels' efforts in providing this technology for the travel industry. The time for change in the travel industry is ripe and the solutions are right there.
outLinkLabel: Watch our keynotes on day two here (YouTube)

title: HSMAday
description: The Hospitality Sales & Marketing Association Deutschland e.V. consolidates over 1,600 members of the hospitality industry and forms a network of as well as a knowledge pool on all relevant specialist areas. Our Managing Director Daniel Poerschke was there and received overwhelming feedback for his presentation of Chain4Travel’s approach to revolutionize the travel industry.
